name: onboarding-improvements-phase1
goal: Implement Phase 1: Onboarding MVP skill (Stream A) + Rapid Context Dump capability (Stream B) for first-session activation flow.

userStories.title: Create onboarding skill scaffold
userStories.description: Create packages/runtime/skills/onboarding/SKILL.md with triggers, discovery phase structure, and path routing placeholder. Follow existing skill patterns from meeting-prep or daily-plan.
acceptanceCriteria: SKILL.md exists at packages/runtime/skills/onboarding/
Triggers include: 'Let's get started', 'Help me set up Areté', 'Onboard me', 'I'm new to Areté'
Frontmatter includes name, description, category (core), triggers array
Discovery phase questions are documented (data sources, immediate need, docs availability)
Path routing structure documented (Path A: data dump, Path B: guided input, Path C: integration first)

userStories.title: Implement discovery questions and path routing logic
userStories.description: Complete the discovery phase with 3-4 key questions and document clear routing criteria to Path A/B/C based on user answers.
acceptanceCriteria: Discovery questions cover: data sources available, immediate need, doc readiness
Path A triggers when user has docs to dump (website, folder, paste)
Path B triggers when user needs guided Q&A input
Path C triggers when user wants to connect integrations first
Routing criteria are explicit and deterministic

userStories.title: Create rapid-context-dump skill scaffold
userStories.description: Create packages/runtime/skills/rapid-context-dump/SKILL.md as standalone capability that can be invoked from onboarding or directly. Include input types, output structure, and review-before-promote workflow.
acceptanceCriteria: SKILL.md exists at packages/runtime/skills/rapid-context-dump/
Triggers include: 'dump my context', 'import my docs', 'bootstrap context from...'
Input types documented: website URL, inputs/onboarding-dump/ folder, pasted text
Output structure documented: draft context files, draft strategy summary, review checklist
Review-before-promote workflow is explicit

userStories.title: Document input handling and fallback matrix
userStories.description: Add detailed input handling for each input type with fallback behavior when inputs are unavailable or fail.
acceptanceCriteria: Pasted text handling documented with extraction guidance
Folder handling documented (inputs/onboarding-dump/) with file type support
Website URL handling documented with extraction approach
Fallback matrix matches PRD: paste > folder > URL priority with graceful degradation
Non-blocking behavior explicit (one channel failure doesn't block flow)

userStories.title: Document draft output format and review workflow
userStories.description: Specify exact draft output format with [DRAFT] labels, source references, and review checklist. Document promotion flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Draft files include [DRAFT] header and source/evidence references
Draft strategy summary template documented
Review checklist template documented
Promotion requires explicit user confirmation
Consent checkpoint documented before ingestion begins

userStories.title: Integrate Path A with rapid-context-dump skill
userStories.description: Wire onboarding Path A to invoke rapid-context-dump skill. Document handoff including website URL entry point.
acceptanceCriteria: Path A explicitly hands off to rapid-context-dump skill
Website URL + context dump entry point is clear
Profile capture fields are collected before handoff (per contract)
Return flow after context dump leads to first-win suggestion

userStories.title: Document first-win recommendation and handoff
userStories.description: Complete the onboarding flow with first-win skill recommendation based on what was set up, and next-step guidance.
acceptanceCriteria: First-win recommendations are context-aware (meeting-prep if calendar, synthesize if docs, week-plan if fresh)
Handoff to first-win skill is documented
Graduation message includes next steps and skill discovery guidance
Flow completes in target time (≤30 min per PRD)

userStories.title: Add contract-compliant profile capture
userStories.description: Ensure onboarding captures minimal identity/profile fields per Contract v1 for downstream Stream C consumption.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile fields captured: name, role, company (per Contract v1)
Fields are written to appropriate workspace location
Graceful handling if user skips optional fields
Contract compliance note in skill documentation

userStories.title: Add contract-compliant domain hints output
userStories.description: Ensure rapid-context-dump emits domain/company hints per Contract v1 for downstream Stream C consumption.
acceptanceCriteria: Domain hints extracted from website URL and content
Hints written to discoverable location or embedded in context
Contract compliance note in skill documentation
Graceful degradation if hints cannot be extracted

userStories.title: Phase 1 validation and quality gates
userStories.description: Run typecheck, tests, verify skills are discoverable, and confirm Phase 1 ship-check passes (A+B ship without C).
acceptanceCriteria: npm run typecheck passes
npm test passes
Both skills appear in arete skill list output
Skills are routable via arete skill route
Phase 1 ship-check confirmed: onboarding + context-dump work without people-intelligence
